responsibilities: Partner with a cross-functional team of data scientists, software engineers, machine learning engineers, and product managers to deliver AI-powered products.
Leverage a broad stack of technologies to reveal insights from large volumes of numeric and textual data.
Build AI foundation models through all phases of development, including design, training, evaluation, validation, and implementation.
Engage in high impact applied research to advance AI developments for customer experiences.
Translate complex work into tangible business goals using interpersonal skills.
qualifications: Proficiency in open-source languages and cloud computing platforms.
Experience in developing AI foundation models and solutions.
Experience building large deep learning models.
Expertise in training optimization, self-supervised learning, robustness, explainability, and RLHF.
Engineering mindset with a track record of delivering models at scale.
Ability to own and pursue a research agenda autonomously.
analysis:
The job responsibilities and skills indicate a strong focus on AI and machine learning. The responsibilities mention building AI foundation models, engaging in applied research to advance AI developments, and leveraging technologies to gain insights from large volumes of numeric and textual data. These tasks suggest involvement with advanced AI techniques, potentially including Generative AI and language models.

The skills required include experience in developing AI foundation models, building large deep learning models, and expertise in training optimization, self-supervised learning, robustness, explainability, and RLHF (Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback). These are all relevant to the development and deployment of Generative AI and language models, as they often require large-scale deep learning models and advanced training techniques.

Overall, the combination of responsibilities and skills strongly suggests that the job involves working with Generative AI and language models, as these are key areas where such technologies are applied and developed.
